name: Drive Masters - Crazy Traffic
description:
Complete the levels by avoiding the city car crash and traffic road in the real city car driving simulator game, earn coins and unlock other cars by clearing the challenging levels. 

Explore different locations in day and night mode to get the thrill of this traffic road city car drive game. Drive your vehicle very fast on the tricky city roads. Have a great city tour indeed! 

Get coins, complete levels and upgrade the cars to increase speed, power and durability of your car game vehicles.

Simple control with a tap - Hold for speed up and release for break.


Features:

Amazing high resolution graphics with best sound effects.
Explore the real open world city traffic environment.
Simple, easy and effective controls.
Smooth and realistic car driving features.
Variety of traffic vehicles like buses, cars etc.
Unlock cars by completing levels and upgrade cars by earning more coins.
